item.title: Report E-2024090413
item.description:
Report E-2024090413

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-22T09:13:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-09
  • City: ELLENWOOD
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On September 9, 2024, one (1) 55-gallon drum of UN2265 was shipped with faulty packaging and released approximately ten (10) gallons of product to the dock floor and pallet below. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Hull's Environmental Services (HES) to remediate the impacted site. HES personnel utilized absorbents to remediate the dock floor and impacted pallet. Crews collected the 55-gallon drum into one (1) 95-gallon drum. All spent absorbent media were collected and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon poly drum for CES processing.
